constituent: divide, muzzle, vase, stand up, mouth, sword, sabre, saber
heisigStory: To "divide and conquer" you use a saber and a muzzle.
koohiiStory1: When you DIVIDE someone, there is sure to be a lot of screaming. That´s why you should use a MUZZLE before using the SABER.
koohiiStory2: Divide and conquer - first you cut them up (saber) , then you shut them up (muzzle).
myStory: chia nhỏ. đứng dao cắt chia nhỏ cho vừa miệng. cắt nhỏ vừa miệng bình
words: 解剖(かいぼう): dissection, autopsy
